content.rendered:
Directed by Rajasimha.

Written by Rajasimha.

Cast Sundeep Kishan(Krishna Vachan). Nithya Menen(Mango (as Nithya Menon)). Ravi Kishan(Anwar). Mohammad Ali((as Ali)).Ajay.Bhadram.Saptha Giri.Thagubothu Ramesh.Meesam Suresh.Prudhviraj . Vishwas Hannurkar(Ram)

Language Telugu.

Producers Anji Reddy.

Production Anji Reddy Productions.
